snippet: The leading outside Democratic group supporting President Obama’s re-election released a new television advertisement on Saturday suggesting that Mitt Romney’s plans would raise taxes on the middle class while cutting them for the wealthy.
abstract: The leading outside Democratic group supporting President Obama’s re-election released a new television advertisement on Saturday suggesting that Mitt Romney’s plans would raise taxes on the middle class while cutting them for the wealthy.

headline.main: New Priorities USA Ad Hits Romney on Tax Plan
